title: Bao Dan Jing Ying
synopsis: After the final battle of StarCraft, Uncle Lei brought his beloved Kerrigan to the nearby planet LOVE in order to avoid the human harassment that still could not accept the existence of Queen of Blades, and lived a happy life of beating every day. However, the two of them seem to be so rich (qu) rich (zhe) many (kan) color (ke), and they were chosen by an inexplicable coquettish god to participate in a competition without a name! Forget it if you can't think of the name of the game! Even a competition is so tacky! It's actually a youthful struggle drama that has always been used to plot! Collect treasures and make wishes! (translated from bilibili)
